data.eml:eml: First record and new species of the genus Hebefustis Siebenaller & Hessler, 1977 (Isopoda: Asellota: Nannoniscidae) from the deep Weddell Sea Basin *

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kaiser, Stefanie (2008): First record and new species of the genus Hebefustis Siebenaller & Hessler, 1977 (Isopoda: Asellota: Nannoniscidae) from the deep Weddell Sea Basin *. Zootaxa 1866: 467-481, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.183769
